review: I decided to go 98% dairy free (I am not vegan or vegetarian) and this yogurt is amazing!! I just sprinkled a little cinnamon and monk fruit sweetner in itand sliced up two big strawberries. YUM! I wonâ€™t miss regular yogurt at all!!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2021
name: Furngirl
title: Great almond milk yogurt
review: This is Greek style yogurt so not quite as thick as regular Greek but very close. I love the vanilla to eat with granola or fruit. The pricing is so much better than the small cups. I highly recommend it.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2021
name: J Kirk
title: Unhealthy mysterious ingredients
review: 3rd ingredient after almonds and water is "Natural Flavors" - do a little research and see all the chemicals and other toxins that can be buried in this category. very deceptive company representing itself a something it's not.Nasty!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2021
name: Coach Janice SD
title: I use this in my favorite breakfast!
review: Every morning I now eat a bowl of this yogurt, berries (I love blackberries!), chia seeds, and Lily's dark chocolate chips.It is my favorite breakfast.It is Keto friendly and the balance of sweet and tart is delicious!I also use it as a non-dairy sub in recipes that call for regular yogurt and it works well.This yogurt is thick (Greek style) and rich.I'm so happy I found it!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2021
name: Margaux11
title: Great Yogurt
review: This product has become a morning staple. I don't consume sugar, flour or any type of animal products so this is fabulous. It's helps me with IBS issues too.
